title: HoP 236 - None for Me, Thanks - Franciscan Poverty
itunes:title: HoP 236 - None for Me, Thanks - Franciscan Poverty
description: Bonaventure and Peter Olivi respond to critics of the Franciscan vow of poverty, in a debate which produced new ideas about economics and rights.
